title: Ep. 197 - It’s Time To Get Rid Of The ‘Hate Crime’ Category
description:
Today on the show, Jussie Smollett’s possibly faked ‘hate crime’ story yet again demonstrates why the ‘hate crime’ category shouldn’t exist. Also, people are freaking out because their tax refunds are smaller. I’ll explain why you shouldn’t want a big refund. Date: 02-13-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
